title: WANTED: Chase "blue portrait" - Sovereign 460 (trade bait included)
author: DerekMichael

posts.post_title: WANTED: Chase "blue portrait" - Sovereign 460 (trade bait included)
posts.post_content:
Hello to my fellow Monster enthusiasts.

I am very interested in purchasing a Hal Chase "blue portrait" with a Sovereign 460 reverse.

Should you have one to spare and would consider parting with it please feel free to shoot me a PM.

Thank you very much.

Derek

I was able to upgrade my Sovereign 150 so I now have this Mathewson Sovereign 150 portrait available for a trade involving a blue Chase  - Sovereign 460 and possibly other interesting T206.

Thank you.

Derek
